extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Deluxe Pool Online, one of the best multiplayer billards available!This game features:- 8 and 9 Ball Multiplayer pool- Realistic 3D animation- Realistic billiard physics- Forward-, Backspin, English- Player profile & statistics- Highscore and replays- Configurable aiming- AND MORE!Join our community of dedicated pool players and play as much billard games as you like! The app also features chat and a buddy list for your favourite pool players. Now go ahead and rack em!How to play: Use automatch to get assigned to a random opponent. You may also challenge players you'd like to play. The game is ad-supported for now. There will be a ad-free version available soon!

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Have not been able to get on multiplayer for four days now sort it out please
reviews.author: Carl Hurley

reviews.title: Server issue?
reviews.comment: Only game I play and on a daily basis. Until today, can\'t connect to multiplayer. Will 5 star when fix (please fix) or help.

reviews.title: I hate this game full of sad boys trying to chat girls up

reviews.title: Bird
reviews.comment: Nice time waster, needs an update to rules for scratch and ball in hand. Physics for breaks and bank shots could use a little work. But its a great pool game.
